---
title: "qwi data"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
qwi_data <- read_csv("qwi2.csv") |> clean_names()
```

```{r}
qwi_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x1, y = beginning_of_quarter_employment_counts)) +
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "Quarterly employment in Baltimore declines since 1990", x = "Year", y = "Employment Counts", subtitle = "Since 1991, total reported employment at the beginning of each quarter has dropped by more than 75% — and hardly rebounded since the COVID-19 pandemic — according to Census data.", caption = "Source: United States Census Bureau") +
  theme_minimal() 
```
